item.title: ------>please help me someone<-----
item.dc:creator: @arve arve
item.description:
@arve wrote:

ok
for the drops go into client java in ur source and find
-dropping-
if i am right ur drops is disabled.
well when u are at dropping
it will say dropping is been disabled use empty instead.
and it will show playerrights 0 or somethin ,

just change the 0 to 4 or sumthing.
then the playerrights with 4( if you have that )
they cant drop.

gl
